name: ESCAPE VELOCITY (quackqack, JimJoms, earlybard)
description:
EARTH IS UNDER ATTACK

And you are humanity's last hope.
Protect the earth while launching escape shuttles to distant galaxies!

HOW TO PLAY

  • Input a rocket launch code, aim with the mouse and click to shoot!
  • Launch missiles to knock asteroids off-course before they hit the earth.
  • Launch escape shuttles off-screen to save the humans on board.

ROCKET TYPES

TypeIconStarting LetterEffectRechargeAnti Asteroid MissileQLow explosion radius.
